mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bot_bank_history_rate(bank_code, buy_bank_note_rate, buy_spot_rate, buy_10days_forward_rate, buy_30days_forward_rate, buy_60days_forward_rate, buy_90days_forward_rate, buy_120days_forward_rate, buy_150days_forward_rate, buy_180days_forward_rate, sell_bank_note_rate, sell_spot_rate, sell_10days_forward_rate, sell_30days_forward_rate, sell_60days_forward_rate, sell_90days_forward_rate, sell_120days_forward_rate, sell_150days_forward_rate, sell_180days_forward_rate, create_date) VALUES
(#{item.bank_code}, #{item.buy_bank_note_rate}, #{item.buy_spot_rate}, #{item.buy_10days_forward_rate}, #{item.buy_30days_forward_rate}, #{item.buy_60days_forward_rate}, #{item.buy_90days_forward_rate}, #{item.buy_120days_forward_rate}, #{item.buy_150days_forward_rate}, #{item.buy_180days_forward_rate}, #{item.sell_bank_note_rate}, #{item.sell_spot_rate}, #{item.sell_10days_forward_rate}, #{item.sell_30days_forward_rate}, #{item.sell_60days_forward_rate}, #{item.sell_90days_forward_rate}, #{item.sell_120days_forward_rate}, #{item.sell_150days_forward_rate}, #{item.sell_180days_forward_rate}, #{item.create_date})
